notes:
This spatial dataset provides the delimitation and composition of the Papua New Guinea district boundaries and is attributed with the provincial, district and local-level government (LLG) areas names in English. The dataset is attributed with key population statistics at the LLG level from the 2000 Census. This dataset was obtained from the National Statistics Office.

This dataset was provided to  the UN-OCHA Regional Office for the Asia-Pacific by the National Statistics Office.
